review: I took a chance on getting this Firestick as knowing what to do with it was a little beyond my age group's experience. Perhaps I didn't need it as my televisions are Smart TV's which means they have built in WireLess capabilites with Amazon, Netflicks, Hulu, HBOgo etc. But, whether I needed it or not, it is a joy to have an alternative to the dredges we usually have to chose from on cable.  We are not reality show fans, hate the shock shows (marriage at first glance, Big Brother etc.) and definitely are not into makeing show biz gossip equal to genuine journalism.  This Firestick has opened many more possibilities for us whenever we wish to escape our normal cable experience.
